Navigation

Navigation list of Navigation.

  • Navigation 1
  • Navigation 2
  • Navigation 3
    • SubNavigation 1
    • SubNavigation 2
    • SubNavigation 3
    • SubNavigation 4
      • SubNavigation 1

      • SubNavigation 4
  • Navigation 4
    • SubNavigation 1
    • SubNavigation 2
      • SubNavigation 1
      • SubNavigation 2
      • SubNavigation 3
      • SubNavigation 4
Top Navigation
Horizontal top navigation navigation..

Javascript

PdNavigation({
    navigationId: 'TopNavigationDemo',
    toggleButtonID: 'TopNavigationDemo-toggle',
    toggleClass: 'TopNavigationDemo-is-show',
    contextId: 'TopNavigationDemo-context',
    navigationCloseID: 'TopNavigationDemo-wrapper',
});

SCSS

#TopNavigationDemo-context {
    height: 400px;
    border: 1px solid var(--pd-border-color);
}

.TopNavigationDemo {
    a {
    padding: 0 12px;
    line-height: 2.25rem;
        &:hover {
            background: var(--pd-hover-color);
            color: var(--pd-primary);
        }
    }
}

.TopNavigationDemo {
    @include to(l) {
        &-wrapper {
            background: rgba(black, 0.5);
            position: fixed;
            width: 100vw;
            height: 100vh;
            z-index: 9999;
            left: -100vw;
            top: 0;
        }
        width: 220px;
        background: var(--pd-panel-bg1);
        height: 100vh;
    }
}

.TopNavigationDemo-is-show {
    .TopNavigationDemo-wrapper {
        left: 0;
    }
}

.TopNavigationDemo {
    @include from(l) {
        li ul {
            min-width: 200px;
            border: 1px solid var(--pd-border-color);
        }
    }
}

#TopNavigationDemo-toggle {
    @include from(l) {
        display: none;
    }
}

HTML

<div id="TopNavigationDemo-context">
    <div class="pd-btn" id="TopNavigationDemo-toggle">=</div>
    <div class="TopNavigationDemo-wrapper" id="TopNavigationDemo-wrapper">
        <ul class="pd-navigation TopNavigationDemo" id="TopNavigationDemo">
            <li><a href="#">Navigation 1</a></li>
            <li><a href="#">Navigation 2</a></li>
            <li><a href="#" class="is-toggle">Navigation 3<i class="icon-down toggle"></i></a>
                <ul>
                    <li><a href="#">SubNavigation 1</a></li>
                    <li><a href="#">SubNavigation 2</a></li>
                    <li><a href="#">SubNavigation 3</a></li>
                    <li><a href="#" class="is-toggle">SubNavigation 4<i class="icon-down toggle"></i></a>
                        <ul>
                            <li><a href="#">SubNavigation 1</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#">SubNavigation 2</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#">SubNavigation 3</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#">SubNavigation 4</a></li>
                        </ul>
                    </li>
                </ul>
            </li>
            <li> <a href="#" class="is-toggle">Navigation 4<i class="icon-down toggle"></i></a>
                <ul>
                    <li><a href="#">SubNavigation 1</a></li>
                    <li><a href="#" class="is-toggle">SubNavigation 2<i class="icon-down toggle"></i></a>
                        <ul>
                            <li><a href="#">SubNavigation 1</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#">SubNavigation 2</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#">SubNavigation 3</a></li>
                            <li><a href="#">SubNavigation 4</a></li>
                        </ul>
                    </li>
                </ul>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>

API

Propiedad Descripción Tipo Default Versión
navigationId id del navigation string pd-navigation
toggleButtonID botton que ocula y muestra el navigation string pd-navigation-toggle
contextId Contexto donde trabaja el navigation string Site
toggleClass clase css que se agrega o quita al contexto para mostrar o ocular el navigation. string pd-navigation-is-show
navigationCloseID id of the element from where the navigation will be closed string
iconClassDown icon to open a subnavigation string icon-down
iconClassUp icon to close a subnavigation string icon-up

Pdui CSS es una libreria Sass/Css minimalista.
